title: Site plan-The site plan sent with an application for permission drawn to a scale of 1:500 shall be d
clause_text: Site plan-The site plan sent with an application for permission drawn to a scale of 1:500 shall be duly signed by the Owner & licensed Surveyor or architect showing in addition to the details in Form-II of Annexure I the following: - The boundaries of the site and of any contiguous land belonging to the owner of the site; The position of the site in relation to neighboring streets; The names of the streets on which the building is proposed to be situated if any;
